title.narrative: Conservation of Ancient and Historic Syriac Cultural Heritage in the Stone-Carved Hillside City of Mardin in Southeastern Turkey

description.narrative: Mardin is home to several hundred medieval and other historic buildings emblematic of the Syriac communitys ancient stone-carving traditions. This project, which involves the documentation and assessment of Syriac buildings and associated craft traditions, directly supports the U.S. embassys efforts to advance regional security and to promote tolerance and respect for cultural diversity.
